full_summary:
Handheld Direction Finding Antenna Kits
=====================================================

**Public Tender Notice**

### Reference Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3773576065-Doc3790315370
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3773576065
* **Publication Date**: 2023-01-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-28T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

### Status

The tender has been cancelled.

### Product Details

* **Product Code**: UNSPC 43221703 (Television Antennas)
* **Product Description**: Handheld Direction Finding Antenna Kits

### Deliveries

Deliveries will be made to Ottawa.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to suppliers participating in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Steve Dumaresq (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [steve.dumaresq@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.dumaresq@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: None

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be found on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys.

### Important Notes

Please note that the closing time for bid submissions has been amended to 28 February 2023 at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. The Department of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) requires
